title: How to make pesto
description: Pesto is very versatile. You can add it to freshly cooked pasta, spread onto white fish before baking, serve with grilled chicken or spread on bruschetta. This homemade version is also much lower in salt than typical shop-bought pesto.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz parmesan cheese (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), cut into small chunks
1 clove garlic, crushed with the flat side of a knife
salt and freshly ground black pepper
